page_links.selector: div#auto-dynamic-list div#item_list div.col div.card div.card-name a

published.selector: main > div > div.card-list > div > div:eq(0) > div.card-page:not(.bg-blue) > div.card-content table.table-page tr:eq(6) td:eq(1)

mileage.selector: div.main-card > div.card-body > div.row > div.col-lg-4 div.icon-group > div:eq(0)

engine.selector: main > div > div.card-list > div > div:eq(0) > div.card-page:not(.bg-blue) > div.card-content table.table-page tr:eq(2) td:eq(1)

transmission.selector: main > div > div.card-list > div > div:eq(0) > div.card-page:not(.bg-blue) > div.card-content table.table-page tr:eq(0) td:eq(1)

fuel.selector: main > div > div.card-list > div > div:eq(0) > div.card-page:not(.bg-blue) > div.card-content table.table-page tr:eq(1) td:eq(1)

body.selector: main > div > div.card-list > div > div:eq(0) > div.card-page:not(.bg-blue) > div.card-content table.table-page tr:eq(4) td:eq(1)

color.selector: main > div > div.card-list > div > div:eq(0) > div.card-page:not(.bg-blue) > div.card-content table.table-page tr:eq(5) td:eq(1)

location.selector: div.main-card > div.card-body > div.row > div.col-lg-4 div.icon-group > div:eq(2)
